content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. Of course, the rental price is negotiable. What are your thoughts on the price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm afraid that's not quite what I'm looking for. I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains. Perhaps we could discuss other terms and conditions to see if we can agree on a mutually beneficial arrangement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
How about 325 Euros per month?

I am willing to negotiate on other terms and conditions as well.

For example, I am willing to sign a longer lease agreement to receive a lower rent.

Or, I am willing to pay more rent if you allow me to make improvements to the apartment.

Or, I am willing to sign a non-renewable lease agreement if you agree to a lower rent in exchange.

Or, I am willing to pay more rent if you allow me to have pets in the apartment.

What do you think?
name: Hassan Rahman

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate on other terms and conditions. However, I am looking for the highest rental price possible. I am not willing to sign a longer lease agreement or allow you to make improvements to the apartment at this time. I am also not willing to sign a non-renewable lease agreement or allow you to have pets in the apartment. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine
